statements: UPDATE AviationCompliance SET documentation = 'Updated documentation' WHERE compliance_id = 'abc123';
UPDATE AviationCompliance SET flight_records = 'New flight records' WHERE compliance_id = 'xyz456';
UPDATE AviationCompliance SET documentation = 'Updated documentation' WHERE compliance_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE AviationCompliance SET flight_records = 'Updated flight records', documentation = 'Revised documentation' WHERE compliance_id = '98765432-1010-5678-9876-543210987654';
UPDATE documentation SET document_name = 'Updated Name', document_content = 'Updated Content' WHERE document_id = 1;
UPDATE flight_records SET departure_date = '2022-10-15', arrival_time = '20:00:00' WHERE flight_id = 1001;
UPDATE documentation SET document_type = 'Manual', document_content = 'Updated manual content' WHERE document_id = 101;
UPDATE flight_records SET arrival_date = '2022-12-31', departure_time = '09:00:00' WHERE flight_id = 201;
UPDATE documentation SET document_name = 'New Document Name' WHERE document_id = '88a70504-6d10-4b71-8562-6e4f91e54017';
UPDATE regulations SET rule_description = 'Updated rule description', rule_category = 'Safety' WHERE rule_id = 'e2643072-78e8-4c65-aa63-96ea7851d638';
UPDATE documentation SET document_name = 'New Document Name', document_link = 'https://example.com/new_document' WHERE document_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE regulations SET rule_description = 'Updated rule description. Please review.', rule_category = 'Updated Category' WHERE rule_id = '987e6543-a21b-43c3-b898-426614174589';
UPDATE documentation SET doc_name = 'Updated Document Name', upload_date = '2021-10-12' WHERE doc_id = 1;
UPDATE compliance_records SET compliance_status = TRUE WHERE compliance_id = 2;
UPDATE documentation SET doc_name = 'New Updated Name', uploaded_by = 'John Doe' WHERE doc_id = 5;
UPDATE compliance_records SET compliance_status = TRUE WHERE compliance_id = 10;
UPDATE ComplianceDocuments SET document_title='Safety Guidelines' WHERE document_id=1;
UPDATE FlightRecords SET aircraft_type='Boeing 747', arrival_location='JFK Airport' WHERE flight_id=100;
UPDATE ComplianceDocuments SET document_type = 'Safety Manual', document_content = 'Updated safety guidelines for all flights' WHERE document_id = 101;
UPDATE FlightRecords SET pilot_name = 'Captain Smith', departure_location = 'JFK Airport' WHERE flight_id = 201;
